short_summary: Dairy products and eggs, Quebec region
description: For the acquisition of dairy products, cheese and eggs located in the province of Quebec as detailed in Annex A.
full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement

## Tender Title
RMSO Dairy Products, Cheeses, and Eggs - Period 03

## Tender Details

* **Reference Number:** WS3954416774-Doc4326974697
* **Amendment Number:** 1
* **Solicitation Number:** WS3954416774
* **Publication Date:** November 27, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date and Time:** January 4, 2024, at 2:00 PM EST
* **Amendment Date:** November 30, 2023

## Period and Contract Details

* **Expected Contract Start Date:** None
* **Expected Contract End Date:** May 31, 2024

## Tender Status
Expired

## Industry Code
* 50130000 - Dairy products and eggs
* 50131800 - Cheese

## Procurement Category
Goods and Services (GD)

## Procurement Method
Competitive Open Bidding

## Selection Criteria
Lowest Price

## Trade Agreements
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

## Regions of Opportunity
None

## Regions of Delivery
* Quebec (excluding National Capital Region)

## Tender Owner
Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)

## Asking Party
Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)

## Contact Information
Stephane Dube (SPAC/PSPC)
s.dube@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

## Notice URL
https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18120194?extsite=MTgxMjAxOTRfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

**Bid Submission Requirements**
All bidders must submit their bids no later than 2:00 PM EST on January 4, 2024. Bids submitted after this
